Package org.hibernate.search.mapper.pojo.bridge.runtime

Interface PropertyBridgeWriteContextExtension<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of extended contexts.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HibernateOrmExtension
    public interface PropertyBridgeWriteContextExtension<T>
    An extension to PropertyBridgeWriteContext, allowing to access non-standard context specific to a given mapper.

    WARNING: while this type is API, because instances should be manipulated by users, all of its methods are considered SPIs and therefore should never be called or implemented directly by users. In short, users are only expected to get instances of this type from an API (SomeExtension.get()) and pass it to another API.

    See Also:
    PropertyBridgeWriteContext.extension(PropertyBridgeWriteContextExtension)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Optional<T> extendOptional​(PropertyBridgeWriteContext original, BridgeSessionContext sessionContext)
      Attempt to extend a given context, returning an empty Optional in case of failure.

    • Method Detail

      • extendOptional

        Optional<T> extendOptional​(PropertyBridgeWriteContext original,
                           BridgeSessionContext sessionContext)
        Attempt to extend a given context, returning an empty Optional in case of failure.

        WARNING: this method is not API, see comments at the type level.

        Parameters:
        original - The original, non-extended PropertyBridgeWriteContext.
        sessionContext - A BridgeSessionContext.
        Returns:
        An optional containing the extended context (PropertyBridgeWriteContextExtension) in case of success, or an empty optional otherwise.
